Entries.{{ModId}}_E1/z spring/z summer/z winter: continue/29 91/farmer 25 90 1 {{ModId}}_Bob 29 66 2 {{ModId}}_Deathskull 28 66 2 {{ModId}}_Doug 27 68 1 {{ModId}}_Sasha 27 67 1 {{ModId}}_Sticky 30 68 3 Maru 37 57 3 Harvey 35 57 1 Caroline 22 72 2 Jodi 22 74 0 Evelyn 20 62 3 Jas 32 78 1 Vincent 33 79 0 Pam 0 54 1/addConversationTopic SiMonsterFriends1 13/skippable/fade/pause 200/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/globalFade/viewport 29 68/pause 200/fade/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "I think we should start with the ones playing with those hay bales down there."/pause 400/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I WOULD LIKE TO TRY THE BUILDING BEHIND US. I SENSE BONES IN THERE."/pause 400/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "You sense bones everywhere. Can we go to the graveyard instead?"/pause 400/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "That patch has fellow mushrooms in it. We should ask them what they know."/pause 200/advancedMove Pam false 26 0 1 100 0 4 2 100 22 0 1 100 0 14 2 100/speed farmer 8/move farmer 0 -20 0 true/emote {{ModId}}_Bob 8 true/emote {{ModId}}_Deathskull 8/pause 100/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 2/pause 100/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 8/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sticky 2/pause 100/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 8 true/pause 100/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Doug 2/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "Hello there fellow human!"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "The, um, sky is very nice today."/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "IT IS A BONE-TIFUL DAY TO BE A SURFACE DWELLER."/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion ...What?#You don't fool me! I can see that you're all monsters!#What do you monsters want with these poor townspeople?#What are monsters like you doing on the surface?(break)pause 200(break)pause 200(break)pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Deathskull 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Bob 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 16/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "You can see our true forms?"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "The jig is up! Run for it!"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "BEGONE MORTAL! YOU SAW NOTHING!"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "But none of the other humans are doing anything. Why is this one?"/pause 300/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 1/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 40/pause 200/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Sasha 2/quickQuestion Huh?#Why hasn't anyone else noticed?#What jig?#I DID TOO SEE SOMETHING! IT'S YOU!(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "We have talismans to make us look human. Why don't they work on you?"(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "Our talismans let us infiltrate this human settlement. Why don't they work on you?"(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "IMPOSSIBLE! HOW COULD YOU SEE PAST OUR HUMAN DISGUISE TALISMANS?"pause 200/quickQuestion Why don't the disguises work on you?#I can see junimos, so this must be a similar situation.#I am an experienced adventurer. Your tricks won't work on me!#I am a powerful sorcerer. Tell me why you're here and I might spare you!#I dunno. Magic?(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "Interesting..."(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "Ha! I have taken down many adventurers before. You will be no different!(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "NOT IF I SPARE YOU FIRST!(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "Makes sense to me."/pause 300/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 2 0 2/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 0 1 2/pause 100/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "I promise you, we don't intend to attack any humans up here.#$e#My name is Sasha."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "I'm Sticky."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I AM DEATHSKULL."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Bob "Bob."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "And the duggy is Doug."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Flops back and forth.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We came here because we wanted to find out if the legends are true."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "The ones about the Spirited Eve!#$b#Where you humans eat your pets!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Bob "And poison each other!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "AND TRANSFORM INTO MONSTERS UNHEARD OF!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion ...WHAT?#Transform?!#Poison?!#Eat pets?!#Do you mean 'Spirit's Eve'?(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YOU CANNOT HIDE THE TRUTH FROM US!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Bob "You pass out small hardened poisons to weed out the weak who succumb to them!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "You're the reason the jack o' lanterns are going extinct!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Bob "Don't put the blame on us innocent spirits!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Whatever you have to say, we're not going home without answers.#$b#We're going to observe you humans until the Spirited Eve and find out the truth for ourselves!"/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YEAH!"/pause 100/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "Monsters forever!"/pause 100/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "Don't get in our way!"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 300/end/fade
